text: Water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 77.17 feet on Thursday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level of the dam was 39.194 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The dam was receiving an inflow of 203 cusecs. About 10,000 cusecs of water is being released from the dam for farm activities in Cauvery Delta districts. Another 400 cusecs of water is let out for irrigation activities under the dam’s East-West canal system, sources said.
title: Mettur level
